title: Where are My draftpick Wins!

replies.body: i think he means that in the new client ---> profile  u can only see your ranked stats and not the normal + aram stats like in the old client

I need a few more details to understand what's going on. First, are you using the Legacy or Beta client? Next, where are you looking that you don't see ARAM/Blind pick wins? Perhaps you can [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) so I can see what you're looking at.
i need my wins back i cant find them :( and i got like 300 wins draft and 120 wins Aram{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
